**Please note that new features must not:**
1. Negatively affect performance.
2. Depend on any external dependencies. 

**Describe the addition or change you'd like to see.**
A description of what you would like Esper to do (or do differently).

**An example of how the API might look.**
If applicable, pseudo code that shows what the change would look like.
